entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
